32  public function exists($key) {
33  return \apcu_exists ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) );

51  protected function getRealKey($key) {
52  return $key;

61  public function fetch($key) {
62  $result = \apcu_fetch ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) );
63  return eval ( $result );
64  }
65 
72  public function file_get_contents($key) {
73  return \apcu_fetch ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) );
74  }
75 
82  public function getTimestamp($key) {
83  $key = $this->getRealKey ( $key );
84  $cache = \apcu_cache_info ();
85  if (empty ( $cache ['cache_list'] )) {
86  return false;
87  }
88  foreach ( $cache ['cache_list'] as $entry ) {
89  if ($entry ['info'] != $key) {
90  continue;
91  }
92  $creationTime = $entry ['creation_time'];
93  return $creationTime;
94  }
95  return \time ();
96  }
97 
98  public function remove($key) {
99  \apcu_delete ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) );
100  }
101 
102  public function clear() {
103  \apcu_clear_cache ();
104  }
105 
106  protected function getCacheEntries($type) {
107  $entries = $this->getAllEntries ();
108  return \array_filter ( $entries, function ($v) use ($type) {
109  return UString::startswith ( $v ['info'], $type );
110  } );
111  }
112 
113  protected function getAllEntries() {
114  $entries = [ ];
115  $cache = \apcu_cache_info ();
116  if (! empty ( $cache ['cache_list'] )) {
117  $entries = $cache ['cache_list'];
118  }
119  return $entries;
120  }
121 
122  public function getCacheFiles($type) {
123  $result = [ ];
124  $entries = $this->getCacheEntries ( $type );
125  foreach ( $entries as $entry ) {
126  $key = $entry ['info'];
127  if (UString::startswith ( $key, $type )) {
128  $result [] = new CacheFile ( \ucfirst ( $type ), $key, $entry ['creation_time'], $entry ['mem_size'], $key );
129  }
130  }
131  if (\sizeof ( $result ) === 0)
132  $result [] = new CacheFile ( \ucfirst ( $type ), "", "", "" );
133  return $result;
134  }
135 
136  public function clearCache($type) {
137  $entries = $this->getCacheEntries ( $type );
138  foreach ( $entries as $entry ) {
139  $this->remove ( $entry ['info'] );
140  }
141  }
142 
143  public function getEntryKey($key) {
144  return $this->getRealKey ( $key );
145  }
146 }
